name: Muon Sets
description:
Creeps must walk to their goal by going from waypoint to waypoint in order. You must build towers and rocks to maze and reroute them. You must also use and upgrade different towers to enhance your most optimized maze and then go head to head against other players in survival mode or in a boss damage test.

A game inspired by old classic Warcraft 3 custom maps like Gem and Evee TD,  a mazing tower defence unlike any other where the  possibilities isn't only enormous but your maze skills gets improved consistently and exponentially.
